name: Aakash
summary: A competent student, pursuing Computer Science, specializing in Information Systems and Data Science.

currentRole.title: Data Scientist
currentRole.summary: - Developing innovative and novel methodologies to utilize social data to analyse brands’ positioning and hypothesising drivers of insights for the qualitative team\r\n- Developed solutions to analyse and model reviews of a product to observe and understand user behaviour\r\n- Worked with PepsiCo, Oxfam Netherlands, and Formula One to identify key content of interest for project

previousRoles.title: Summer Analyst - Technology
previousRoles.summary: - Developed the POC for Report Traceability Dashboard which illustrates the relationship between various market reports and their corresponding books and feeds\r\n- Interacted with various stakeholders to come up with the requirements and specifications of the dashboard\r\n- Reduced the extraction of data from 20 minutes to a couple of minutes by coming up with complex SQL queries

previousRoles.title: Intern
previousRoles.summary: - Developed a SharePoint solution to simplify the management of machines and used PerformancePoint Services to deploy a tool to help the management take various machine-related-decisions\r\n- Designed a dashboard to monitor the production performance of the personalization department using Macros, Java, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript\r\n- Improved overall efficiency by reducing man-hours from 3-4 hours to a couple of minutes on machine tracking

educationEntries.course_title: All India Senior School Certificate Examination
